sentences.sentence: Surely it is an economic nonsense to deplete the world of natural resources.
sentences.translation: 耗尽世界的自然资源无疑是一件经济上的愚蠢行为。
为什么飞行会耗尽我们的精力？

sentences.sentence: Unlike meat from those filthy places, it will not pollute rivers and streams, deplete groundwater or cause deforestation.
sentences.translation: 不像来自那些污秽场所的肉，它不会污染河流和小溪，不会大量消耗地下水，也不会引起滥伐森林。
